This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving my kids to their mother's heading north up interstate 45 entering clear lake\webster area. i began to notice helicopters and airplanes in the sky which did not do more than barely get me to look up and watch them. i noticed multiple bright star-like objects far above them underneath the overcast sky, flying in slow swooping or curving tracks seeming to float further up into the sky. i was excited and started to look for more and noticed a larger and brighter star-object on the horizon floating downward slowly towards the tree line. i had no clue what these things were, they looked like stars. they were maybe a mile away, maybe more. but the light beams from them would pierce through the black sky much like a star's light would, and also had an iridescent twinkle to them. they looked just like stars. i focused on the larger one because i was excited to witness this and did not want to miss any more of what ever was going on. i felt an exciting tingle all the way to my finger-tips. i was incredibly intrigued and hollered to my kids to look but they would not stir from their sleep. which was odd, i also oddly gave up quickly trying to wake them. i began to video tape the objects. i video taped the larger object mostly and i think i saw it absorb another smaller one that seemed to come from the ground behind the tree-line. they object was to my left eventually almost below the trees, where i think it landed, and i could not track it and drive at the same time anymore. i have a couple grainy videos that i took with my crappy phone that i would love to give copies of, if they provide any help whatsoever.
Summary: Saw increased aerial activity while driving on highway, started noticing multiple UFO's behaving differently.
